extendedInfo.description: PUT YOUR ACCURACY AND REFLEXES TO THE TEST, PREVENTING THE BALL HIT THE GROUND! HANG THE BALL IS THE BEST GAME FOR CHILDREN TO HAVE FUN TRAINING THEIR REFLEXES, ACCURACY (HAND-EYE COORDINATION) AND TENACITY.Hang the balls can be played in several colorful scenarios, with different levels of difficulty: how many times can you hit the ball before it hits the ground?Hang the ball is ideal to entertain your children while improving their coordination, but also perfect for adults of all ages, because you can compete globally with other players showing who has more flare and patience, unlocking achievements that demonstrate what are you able to do, and getting new scenarios with different characteristics of gravity.â Tested successfully with children from 2 to 5 years of age.â With bright colors and simple screens that will delight your children.â Compete in the Taps World Ranking!â Get up 1000 points of achievements as game milestones.â Unlock up 4 scenarios and balls available.â Identify in the ranking with your preferred alias (or play as guest).â Suitable for smartphones and tablets.â Discover the secret stage.
